mapper.select: SELECT b.device id,d.name name, IFNULL(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,b.begin_time,b.end_time)),0)*100/ SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,d.create_time,NOW())) greatest(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,greatest(d.create_time,#{beginTime}),LEAST(NOW(),#{endTime}))),0.001) AS rate FROM book_recode b RIGHT JOIN device d ON d.id=b.device WHERE b.status != -1 And begin_time<= NOW() group BY b.device ORDER BY rate DESC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device (No, name, description, model,band,location,require_reputation,func,status) VALUES (#{No}, #{name}, #{description}, #{model},#{band},#{location},#{requireReputation},#{func},#{status})
